//Generated by BehavEd


task ( "up" )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "up" );
}


task ( "down" )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "down" );
}


loop ( -1 )
{
	dowait ( "up" );
	set ( "SET_STANCE", "Crouch" );
	wait ( $random( 5000, 10000 )$ );
	set ( "SET_STANCE", "Stand" );
	dowait ( "down" );
	set ( "SET_STANCE", "Crouch" );
	wait ( $random( 5000, 10000 )$ );
	set ( "SET_STANCE", "Stand" );
}
